name: The Willow
description:
You find yourself lost in the woods, a small house stands before you. The only sign of sanctuary before you. Do you enter or take your chances in the woods?

The Willow is a short experimental game made over a month. It was developed with Gamemaker Studio 2. Due to the time constraints the game lacks polish and is a fairly short experience, roughly 10-15 minutes at most. Ultimately this is more of a demo then a full game, but I hope you can find some enjoyment in it.

Controls.

  • WASD to move
  • Left click to interact
  • Right click to examine
  • Esc to quit

Two version are available, a ZIP version or an .exe installer both are identical, just changes how you want to download it

Sorry for the issues with the previous ZIP
